member.name: F:Activatable
member.summary: Managed peer is eligeable for activation.

remarks.para: A managed peer is activatable if it the native peer was constructed first and a forthcoming constructor invocation is assumed to be forthcoming.

A managed peer is replaceable if it was created through . Being "replaceable" means that if another peer instance is created around the same Java instance, the newly created instance will replace the replaceable peer in the Java-to-managed instance mapping.
